Detailed Description

PatchLevelFillPattern implementation for filling at PatchLevel boundaries.

For documentation on this interface see xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern

The fill boxes will consist of the ghost regions lying outside of the level interior--in other words the ghost regions at physical and coarse-fine boundaries.

void SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelBorderFillPattern::computeFillBoxesAndNeighborhoodSets ( hier::BoxLevel &  fill_mapped_boxes,
hier::Connector &  dst_to_fill,
const hier::BoxLevel &  dst_mapped_box_level,
const hier::Connector &  dst_to_dst,
const hier::Connector &  dst_to_src,
const hier::Connector &  src_to_dst,
const hier::IntVector &  fill_ghost_width 
) [virtual]

Compute the mapped boxes to be filled and related communication data.

The computed fill_mapped_boxes will cover the ghost regions around the boxes of dst_mapped_box_level at coarse-fine and physical boundaries. The width of those ghost regions will be determined by fill_ghost_width.

Parameters:
[out] fill_mapped_boxes Output BoxLevel to be filled
[out] dst_to_fill Output Connector between dst_mapped_box_level and and fill_mapped_boxes
[in] dst_mapped_box_level destination level
[in] dst_to_dst Connector of destination to itself
[in] dst_to_src Connector of destination to source
[in] src_to_dst Connector of source to destination
[in] fill_ghost_width Ghost width being filled by refine schedule

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

bool SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelBorderFillPattern::needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes (  )  const [virtual]

Return true to indicate source patch owners cannot compute fill boxes without using communication.

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

void SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelBorderFillPattern::computeDestinationFillBoxesOnSourceProc ( FillSet &  dst_fill_boxes_on_src_proc,
const hier::BoxLevel &  dst_mapped_box_level,
const hier::Connector &  src_to_dst,
const hier::IntVector &  fill_ghost_width 
)

Virtual method to compute the destination fill boxes.

Since needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes() returns true, this method should never be called. It is implemented here to satisfy the pure virtual interface from the base class. An error will result if this is ever called.

bool SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelBorderFillPattern::doesSourceLevelCommunicateToDestination (  )  const [virtual]

Tell RefineSchedule not to communicate data directly from source to destination level.

RefineSchedule should not attempt to fill as much of the destination level as possible from the source level at the same level of resolution for this fill pattern.

Returns:
false

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.
